note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: NoMoreSpam
body:
Anti-Spam,is a Anti-spam plugins which it's prevent spam to your server,Sick+bored of those spams?
Use No-More-Spam!.A brand new plugin,which it's maybe get updated with more features.
Also No-More-Spam support censor,Which it's located in your No-More-Spam folder
This plugin is still Work-In-Progress.
Thanks,for reading this page.

###Special thanks for github for this page!
###Special thanks for craftbukkit team for making bukkit servers.
